Detailed Description

Contains logic used for acquiring information about network devices.

Function Documentation

int ipwd_devinfo ( char *  p_dev,
char *  p_ip,
char *  p_mac 
)

Gets the IP and MAC addresses of specified device in human readable form.

Based on examples from: http://english.geekpage.jp/programming/linux-network/

Parameters:
p_dev Name of the device (i.e. eth0)
p_ip Pointer to string where the IP address should be stored
p_mac Pointer to string where the MAC address should be stored
Returns:
IPWD_RV_SUCCESS if successful IPWD_RV_ERROR otherwise

Variable Documentation

char msgbuf[IPWD_MSG_BUFSIZ]

Buffer for output messages.
